82% of Mexico's population considers the: What percentage of Mexico's population is Catholic? Mexico Catholic population percentage 2023
Christianity is the predominant religion in Mexico comprising 91.3% of the population. Catholicism is its largest denomination representing around 78% of the total population as of 2020 census.
What percentage of Mexico's population is Catholic? Mexico Catholic population percentage 2023

Roman Catholic was the most common religion affiliation in Mexico in 2023. In a survey carried out that year, roughly 69.4 percent of Mexican respondents claimed to be of catholic faith. Mexico ranks among the Latin American countries with the highest share of Catholics.
